directions: Stir together the sugar, cocoa powder, butter, and chestnut puree in a bowl. Fold in the almonds and walnuts until evenly blended. Pat the mixture into a log and wrap tightly with wax paper. Refrigerate overnight before slicing to serve.
ingredients: 1/2 cup unsweetened cocoa powder (such as Hershey's®)
title: Chocolate Salami
